segments.text: I would like to make an appointment to discuss the problems I keep having with my apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you having problems ? This is the first I ’ Ve heard of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We gave you a list of problems last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of problems are you talking about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the garbage disposal doesn ’ t work , we have rats , and the toilet is backed up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe I could get back to you in a few weeks . I am leaving on vacation this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These things are your responsibility , and you need to fix them immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t tell me what to do ! I ’ ll get to it when I get around to it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If these problems are not addressed immediately , I will be contacting the health department this Friday and you will not get a rent check .
segments.speaker: S1
